RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Punk
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME spent his childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.

RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.Title: Game developer
RimTrans.Framework.Injection.BackstoryIn.BaseDesc: NAME was an independent game developer.\n\nAfter an early success, NAME's career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.
